content: Yes, there have been several Tony Award winners on A Morning show in the past, including stars such as Ben Platt, Patti LuPone, Kristin Chenoweth, Audra McDonald, and Lin-Manuel Miranda. Additionally, many other distinguished guests who are Tony-nominated or have been involved in Broadway productions have also been invited on the show, making A Morning an excellent source to stay updated on the latest news and insights behind the Broadway industry.
